title: LOVE IT!
text: I love it SO much! Thanks, Microsoft !

title: App locked !!!
text:
The app locked and freezes, I can’t open the app even manually and can’t use all the apps which needs authentication. 
Please help.

title: Hack My A***
text:
Hackers can’t use your phone info to get the codes. 
W/Iphone, you have to enter your passcode / Face before accessing Authenticator app - to get the new refresh codes. Triple extra security layer!

title: It would be better if has a Watch App
text: Would be nice to have a watch App, sometimes you had to go to another room to reach for your phone, when you got your Watch on your wrist.

title: Awesome app. The most annoying bug
text: Please stop forcing me to sign in twice, once for verifying an app login and then a second time to get into the app to view codes. It makes no sense, I am using the same credentials.. If you’d just preserve my login token for just one more step! I’ll update my review when the app gets an update to resolve this annoying bug.

title: Finding a replacement for Authenticator+ before I switch phones
text: I guess auth+ is gone now? Duo Mobile has backup but tying the backup to a msft account seems like a good long game play. So far it’s been good.

title: Can be useful
text: Still trying to get. Adjusted to it

title: Not working properly with ios 17
text: I have to type in username and password every time i click from a link in teams to go to my azure account. It was not needed before. Please someone take a look at it.

title: I don’t get it
text: When I try to put my blackboard account for my outlook, it tells me to use the Authenticator app(this app) but I can’t because I have to add my blackboard in here and it keeps telling me to use the Authenticator app to add it but I can’t!
